context.#text:
The mandatory information in this section is personâ€™s name, date of birth and address. There can be multiple addresses associated with a person including temporary and correspondence addresses. These are stored on the PDS. <br clear="none"/>
<br clear="none"/>Note that the Individual requirements section includes specific elements for accessible information requirements to support communication. It is recognised that some of the elements in this section are currently shared in a more granular way than currently defined in this information model. PRSB intends to address this in a later release of the information model.

desc.#text: The person's details and contact information.
Details of the person's name
The first name(s) of the person. This includes middle names.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_given_name.html?hl=person%2Cgiven%2Cname" target="" title="">Person given name</a>

desc.#text: The family name or surname of the person

operationalization.#text:
NHS data dictionary : - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_family_name.html" target="" title="">Person family name</a>
<br clear="none"/>

desc.#text: The name by which a person wishes to be addressed. The preferred name volunteered by the person or a preferred name given by PDS that the person has asked to be called by.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary: - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_full_name.html?hl=person%2Cname" target="" title="">Person full name</a>

desc.#text: Person's title

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary: - <a href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_dictionary/data_field_notes/p/pers/person_title_de.asp?shownav=1" target="" title="">Person title</a>

desc.#text: A textual suffix that may be added to the end of a PERSON's name, for example, OBE, MBE, BSc, JP, GM

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary: - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_name_suffix.html" target="" title="">Person suffix</a>

desc.#text: The full name of the person in text representation.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a class="" href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_full_name.html?hl=person%2Cname" target="" title="">Patient full name</a>

desc.#text: The date of birth of the person.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary:- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_birth_date.html?hl=person%2Cbirth%2Cdate" target="" title="">Person birth date</a>

desc.#text: The person's stated gender.

operationalization.#text:
NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_stated_gender_code.html?hl=person%2Cstated%2Cgender%2Ccode" target="" title="">Person stated gender code</a>
<br clear="none"/>

desc.#text: The ethnicity of the person as specified by the person.

source.#text:
NHS_Wales: <a class="" href="https://fhir.standards.wales/CodeSystem/DataStandardsWales-Ethnicity" target="" title="">https://fhir.standards.wales/CodeSystem/DataStandardsWales-Ethnicity</a>
<br clear="none"/>NHS_NSS: <a class="" href="https://www.ndc.scot.nhs.uk/Dictionary-A-Z/Definitions/index.asp?Search=E&amp;ID=243&amp;Title=Ethnic%20Group" target="" title="">https://www.ndc.scot.nhs.uk/Dictionary-A-Z/Definitions/index.asp?Search=E&amp;ID=243&amp;Title=Ethnic%20Group</a>

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/ethnic_category.html" target="" title="">Ethnic category</a>

desc.#text: The religious affiliation as specified by the person.

operationalization.#text: SNOMED_CT: <a href="https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/?perspective=full&amp;conceptId1=999000531000000100&amp;edition=uk-edition&amp;release=v20201028&amp;server=https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/sct-browser-api/snomed&amp;langRefset=999001261000000100,999000691000001104" target="" title="">^999000531000000100 |Religious or other belief system affiliation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)|</a>

desc.#text: The personâ€™s phenotypic sex. Determines how the person will be treated clinically.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary: - <a class="" href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_phenotypic_sex.html" target="" title="">person phenotypic sex</a>

desc.#text: The unique identifier for a person within the NHS in England and Wales.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary:- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/nhs_number.html" target="" title="">NHS number</a>

desc.#text: Provides an indication of the reliability of an NHS Number.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a class="" href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_dictionary/attributes/n/nhs/nhs_number_status_indicator_code_de.asp?shownav=1" target="" title="">NHS number status indicator</a>

desc.#text: Country specific or local identifier, e.g. Community Health Index (CHI) in Scotland.

operationalization.#text: <div>NHS data dictionary: -&#160;<a class="" href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/local_patient_identifier__extended_.html?hl=local%2Cpatient%2Cidentifier%2Cextended" target="" title="">Local patient identifier(extended)</a>, <a class="" href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/health_and_care_number.html" target="" title="">Health and care number (NI only)</a>,&#160;<a class="" href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/community_health_index_number.html" target="" title="">Community health index number</a>&#160;(Scotland only)</div>

desc.#text: Personâ€™s usual place of residence, and where relevant temporary and correspondence addresses.
Person's first line of address.
Person's second line of address.
Person's third line of address.

operationalization.#text:
<div>NHS data dictionary : - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/patient_usual_address.html" target="" title="">Address line 3</a>
</div>

Person's fifth line of address.

operationalization.#text:
NHS data dictionary : - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/patient_usual_address.html" target="" title="">Address line 5</a>
<br clear="none"/>

desc.#text: The person's postcode.

operationalization.#text:
NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/postcode_of_usual_address.html" target="" title="">Postcode of usual address</a>
<br clear="none"/>

desc.#text: The type of address e.g. Main address, Temp address

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary : - <a class="" href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_dictionary/attributes/a/add/address_association_type_de.asp?shownav=1" target="" title="">Address association type</a>

desc.#text: Details of the person's contact information.
Preferred contact method, e.g. email, letter, phone, text message etc.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_dictionary/attributes/c/com/communication_contact_method_de.asp?shownav=1" target="" title="">Communication contact method</a>

desc.#text: The person's telephone number details
The person's telephone number

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary : - <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/uk_telephone_number.html" target="" title="">UK telephone number</a>

desc.#text: The contact type e.g. home, mobile

operationalization.#text: FHIR value set: - <a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/codesystem-contact-point-use.html" target="" title="">Contact point use</a>

desc.#text: The preferred order of use for the telephone number

operationalization.#text: Preference of use 1-5, 1 being the highest.

desc.#text: Details of the person's email address
Email address of the person.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a>Contact email address</a>

desc.#text: The type of email address, home, work

operationalization.#text: FHIR value set: - <a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/codesystem-contact-point-use.html" target="" title="">Contact point use</a>

desc.#text: The preferred order of use of email address

operationalization.#text: Preference of use 1-5, 1 being the highest.

desc.#text: Contact details via fax, sms, url

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary:- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/attributes/communication_contact_string.html" target="" title="">Communication contact string</a>

desc.#text: A photograph of the person for identification and to show what the person looks like normally.

operationalization.#text: Mulitmedia file

desc.#text: The country of birth of the person.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_dictionary/attributes/c/cou/country_code_de.asp?shownav=1" target="" title="">Country code (birth)</a>

desc.#text: An indicator to identify the legal marital status of the person.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/person_marital_status.html?hl=marital%2Cstatus" target="" title="">Person marital status</a>

desc.#text: Include details of the immigration status of the person, their permissions to live and receive care and support in the UK e.g. asylum seeker, indefinite leave to remain in the UK. Include start date, end date and any comments.
Details of the immigration status of the person, their permissions to live and receive care and support in the UK e.g. asylum seeker, indefinite leave to remain in the UK.

operationalization.#text: Code :- 1: Asylum Seeker; 2: Exceptional leave to remain in UK; 3: Indefinite Leave to Remain in UK ;4: Limited Leave to Remain in UK; 5: No Recourse to Public Funds (NRPF); 6: Other Nationals; 7: Refugee; 8: Unaccompanied Asylum Seeker; 9 EU pre-settled status; 10: EU settled status

desc.#text: Start date of immigration status

operationalization.#text: Date and time

desc.#text: End date of immigration status

operationalization.#text: Date and time

desc.#text: Relevant comments about the person's immigration status

operationalization.#text: Free text

desc.#text: Whether the person has given consent for organ and/or tissue donation or opted out of automatic donation where applicable. This is information provided by the national register.

operationalization.#text: Flag: - Yes or No

desc.#text: The charging category relating to an overseas visitor.

operationalization.#text: NHS data dictionary :- <a href="https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/overseas_visitor_charging_category.html" target="" title="">Overseas visitor charging catergory</a>
